func:
var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', true)
msg.setpoint = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.setpoint') || 0
msg.topic = 'temp-BK'
msg.cmd = 'start'
msg.payload = 0
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', false)
msg.cmd = 'stop'
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', false)

if (msg.state == 'succeeded') {
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Kp', msg.payload.Kp)
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Ki', msg.payload.Ki)
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Kd', msg.payload.Kd)
} 

var msg_out = { enabled: true } // enable any dashboard ui
return msg_out

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var Kp = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Kp') || 0
var Ki = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Ki') || 0
var Kd = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.tuned.gain.Kd') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.gain.Kp', Kp)
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.gain.Ki', Ki)
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.gain.Kd', Kd)
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.time.PB', 1/Kp)
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.time.Ti', 1/Ki)
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.accepted.time.Td', 1/Kd)

return msg;

monitor thermocouple failure
info:
this section of nodes will start a timer when 
the thermocouple returned data is either
32 or NaN.

after the timer has expired the thermocouple
will be considered faulty.

when the thermocouple begins transmitting 
values other than 32 or NaN again another
timer will start.

once this timer expires then the thermocouple
will be considered ok again.

name: monitor thermocouple failure

once this timer expires then the thermocouple
